name: Styrenics Circular Solutions
membership: SCS closely cooperates with PlasticsEurope in areas of common interest (https://www.plasticseurope.org/en).
goal:
Styrenics Circular Solutions (SCS) was founded by leading styrenics manufacturers united by a common goal: to transform the styrenics industry by un-leashing polystyrene’s value as a fully and infinitely recyclable material. To this aim SCS is encouraging the engagement of the entire value chain – from partners in supply chain to converters, recyclers, brand owners, retailers and trade associations.

For more information please visit: http://styrenics-circular-solutions.com/
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: SCS is focused on all regulatory and policy initiatives of relevance to its mission, objective and members/partners. This includes policy measures under the Circular Economy initiative and broader EU Plastics Strategy, including related recycling-, waste collection and sorting technologies and initiatives.
